descriptionHtml:
================================================================
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

Armor, Robes and Clothes 300 | 1.21

Textures By, 
	-Baratan

Special Thanks to,
	-Bethsoft Game Studio
================================================================
Installation instructions
----------------------------------------------------------------
1- Extract the archive to your \"Skyrim/Data\" folder.

2- Launch Skyrim
================================================================
Mod Description
----------------------------------------------------------------
This mod is the beginning of what will be an appearance and 

balance overall for Skyrim\'s vanilla Armor, Robes and Clothes.
Currently only textures are changed. I have, using my own 

filters, changed the appearance of various Armor, Robes and 

Clothes in the game. No other item changes have been made at this 

point.
I did not change the texture resolutions. I did remove much of 

the excess noise from the textures and normal maps, as well as 

adjusting the color among other things.
I\'ve uploaded Before/After shots of SOME of the armor, robes and 

clothes that I have retextured. All in the same room, at the same 

angle, to give a small sample of the changes I\'ve made.
================================================================
Version History
----------------------------------------------------------------
1.21
Changed the Textures of...
-Archmage robes. Spent more time on this than anything else so 

far.
1.20
Changed the Textures of...
-Farmer clothes. All 4 styles. Male and female.
-Redid monk style robes again. All colors. More subdued look.
-Subdued red and green on fine clothes. Also redid the black 

coat.
1.11
-Redid the Iron armor textures. Male and female.
1.10
Changed the Textures of...
-Merchant clothes, boots and hats
-Mage, monk and plain robes and hoods
-Iron armor, gloves, shield and boots
1.00
Changed the Textures of...
-Orcish armor and shield
-Fine clothes, boots, hats and gloves
-Guard armor, helmets, gloves, boots and shields
================================================================
Contact Info
----------------------------------------------------------------
Questions/Comments and fellow modders welcome to contact me at 

ByblosHex At Gmail.com
================================================================
Agreement
----------------------------------------------------------------
For downloading and installing this modification I ask you to...
-Do not sell any of the contents of this archive or the archive 

as a whole.
-Do not share or otherwise redistribute any of the archive\'s 

contents or the archive as a whole without permission form the 

author.
-Do read the Readme
================================================================
Downloads & Extras
----------------------------------------------------------------
Download my Oblivion mods here:
http://www.tesnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=34843
Download my Skyrim mods here:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=34843
author: Baratan
